layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x110
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x110
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x86
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 111x19
          text run at (0,0) width 111: "COL WIDTH=px"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 608x50 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0

          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 606x44

                text run at (2,22) width 78: "of 200 pixels"
